content.p: IN THE __________ COURT OF __________ COUNTY STATE OF GEORGIA A.B., ) Plaintiff ) ) v. ) Civil action ) File no. __________ C.D., ) Defendant ) JUDGMENT This action came on for (trial) (hearing) before the court, Honorable John Marshall, presiding, and the issues having been duly (tried) (heard) and a decision having been duly rendered, It Is Ordered and Adjudged (That the plaintiff A.B. recover of the defendant C.D. the sum of $______, with interest thereon at the rate of ______ percent as provided by law, and his costs of action.) or (That the plaintiff take nothing, that the action be dismissed on the merits, and that the defendant C.D. recover of the plaintiff A.B. his costs of action.) Dated at ________, Georgia, this ______ day of ________, ______. __________________________________ Judge
